mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM (
select u.u_nick, p.p_title, p.p_content, p.p_file, p.p_date, p.p_view, p.p_idx from bmt_user u, bmt_post p where u.u_email = p.u_email order by p.p_date desc
) A )
WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{page}*3 + 1) AND ((#{page}+1) * 3)
select p.postid, u.email, u.u_name, p.title, p.p_content, p.imgPath from bmt_post p, bmt_user u where u.email = p.email
select c.c_idx, c.p_idx, c.c_content, c.c_date, c.u_email, u.u_nick from bmt_comment c, bmt_user u where u.u_email = c.u_email and c.p_idx=#{p_idx} order by c.c_idx desc
